translations: 重新组装（reassemble 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The issue will come under the spotlight when parliament reassembles.
sentences.translation: 等议会重开的时候，这个问题将成为焦点。

sentences.sentence: The kernel then reassembles all of the fragments to get a full packet.
sentences.translation: 核心然后会重新组装所有的片段形成一个完整的数据包。

sentences.sentence: Just as in TDM, the selector reassembles segments of data being written from multiple clients.
sentences.translation: 就像在TDM中那样，选择器重新装配从多个客户机写入的数据段。
